sys_script.name: Auto Updating Parking Slot

sys_package.display_value: Resident service and visitor management system

sys_scope.display_value: Resident service and visitor management system

application.display_value: Resident service and visitor management system

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_5fab3be4a5bf22107f44045be81579a2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_visitors</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_visitors">u_parking_needed=true^u_parking_slotISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_parking_needed" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="false" field="u_parking_slot" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Auto Updating Parking Slot</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    if (!current.u_vehicle_type) {
        return;
    }


    var slotGR = new GlideRecord('u_parking_slot'); // Your Parking Slot table
    slotGR.addQuery('u_vehicle_type', current.u_vehicle_type); // Match vehicle type reference
    slotGR.addQuery('u_status', 'Available'); // Assuming 'u_status' is status field name
    slotGR.orderBy('sys_created_on'); // Optional: select earliest slot
    slotGR.query();


    if (slotGR.next()) {
        // Allocate this parking slot to visitor
        current.u_parking_slot = slotGR.sys_id; // Assuming 'u_parking_slot' is field in Visitors table


        // Update parking slot status to 'Reserved'
        slotGR.u_status = 'Reserved';
        slotGR.update();
    } else {
        // Clear if no available slot found
        current.u_parking_slot = '';
    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Chandra Veera Nooka Sai Teja.Vinukonda</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-02 14:22:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fab3be4a5bf22107f44045be81579a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Updating Parking Slot</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Resident service and visitor management system" source="e8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117c">e8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Resident service and visitor management system">e8373316286322107f449b0adbfc117c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5fab3be4a5bf22107f44045be81579a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Rashmika.Masaram</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-05 09:15:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5fab3be4a5bf22107f44045be81579a2"/></record_update>
